Regarding defense, trans-national military allianc...

Now, this kind of thought of mine derives from the tradition of Anarcho-Capitalism. But I think I have an uncommon yet logically equivalent way of explaining this, namely, under this system that i propose, every single individual and his properties has the right to secede from the sovereignty and jurisdiction that he is in. I think if we adopt this doctrine, the barrier to entry of creating new nations would be reduced to its minimum, and the transaction cost of changing countries would also be reduced to its minimum. After the person secedes, he can then form free associations with other persons (while maintaining the right to secede from these associations as well), and all services that the nation states currently provide would still be provided by the new institutions of this society.
